video.title: prometheus
video.subTitle: by elements on videohive
video.description: Here are just some of the XML variables you can set for this gallery: 4x3 mode or 16x9 mode, auto start video, keep Aspect Ratio when in full screen, number of seconds to buffer video, category button and text colors for all three button state changes, large bg image can change for every video, large video title - subtitle - description text colors and x & y, video width, video height, colors for all video controls, thumbnail bg image, back and forward button and arrow colors, scroll bar color, scroller color.
